Affinity Sliding.name: Affinity Sliding
Affinity Sliding.description: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

Agitator.name: Agitator
Agitator.description: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.

Agitator.name: Agitator
Agitator.description: While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.

Agitator.name: Agitator
Agitator.description: While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.

Agitator.name: Agitator
Agitator.description: While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.

Agitator.name: Agitator
Agitator.description: While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

Aquatic Expert.name: Aquatic Expert
Aquatic Expert.description: Prevents water from slowing movements and improves evasion while in water.

Aquatic Expert.name: Aquatic Expert
Aquatic Expert.description: Prevents water from slowing movements and greatly improves evasion while in water.

Artillery.name: Artillery
Artillery.description: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.

Artillery.name: Artillery
Artillery.description: Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.

Artillery.name: Artillery
Artillery.description: Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

BBQ Master.name: BBQ Master
BBQ Master.description: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

Blast Functionality.name: Blast Functionality
Blast Functionality.description: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

Blast Resistance.name: Blast Resistance
Blast Resistance.description: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.

Blast Resistance.name: Blast Resistance
Blast Resistance.description: Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

Blight Resistance.name: Blight Resistance
Blight Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.

Blight Resistance.name: Blight Resistance
Blight Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

Blindsider.name: Blindsider
Blindsider.description: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

Botanist.name: Botanist
Botanist.description: One extra consumable herb item per gather.

Botanist.name: Botanist
Botanist.description: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.

Botanist.name: Botanist
Botanist.description: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.

Botanist.name: Botanist
Botanist.description: One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

Bow Charge Plus.name: Bow Charge Plus
Bow Charge Plus.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

Bow Charge Plus.name: Bow Charge Plus
Bow Charge Plus.description: Increases max bow charge level by one.

Cliffhanger.name: Cliffhanger
Cliffhanger.description: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

Critical Boost.name: Critical Boost
Critical Boost.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.

Critical Boost.name: Critical Boost
Critical Boost.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.

Critical Boost.name: Critical Boost
Critical Boost.description: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

Detector.name: Detector
Detector.description: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.

Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.

Divine Blessing.name: Divine Blessing
Divine Blessing.description: While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

Dungmaster.name: Dungmaster
Dungmaster.description: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

Earplugs.name: Earplugs
Earplugs.description: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.

Earplugs.name: Earplugs
Earplugs.description: Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.

Earplugs.name: Earplugs
Earplugs.description: Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.

Earplugs.name: Earplugs
Earplugs.description: Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

Effluvial Expert.name: Effluvial Expert
Effluvial Expert.description: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

Entomologist.name: Entomologist
Entomologist.description: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.

Entomologist.name: Entomologist
Entomologist.description: Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.

Entomologist.name: Entomologist
Entomologist.description: Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

Flinch Free.name: Flinch Free
Flinch Free.description: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.

Focus.name: Focus
Focus.description: Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

Forager's Luck.name: Forager's Luck
Forager's Luck.description: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

Fortify.name: Fortify
Fortify.description: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

Free Elem/Ammo Up.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
Free Elem/Ammo Up.description: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

Free Elem/Ammo Up.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
Free Elem/Ammo Up.description: Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

Free Elem/Ammo Up.name: Free Elem/Ammo Up
Free Elem/Ammo Up.description: Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.

Geologist.name: Geologist
Geologist.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.

Geologist.name: Geologist
Geologist.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.

Geologist.name: Geologist
Geologist.description: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, special item gathering points, and mining outcrops.

Guild Guidance.name: Guild Guidance
Guild Guidance.description: Adds Great Luck when 4 pieces of Guild Cross α Set or Guild Cross β Set are equipped.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and recudes stamina depletion by 15%.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and recudes stamina depletion by 15%.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and recudes stamina depletion by 30%.

Guard.name: Guard
Guard.description: Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and recudes stamina depletion by 50%.

Guard Up.name: Guard Up
Guard Up.description: Allows you to block agaisnt ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Guard Up.name: Guard Up
Guard Up.description: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Heroics.name: Heroics
Heroics.description: While active, increases attack power by 5% and increases defense by 15 points.

Heroics.name: Heroics
Heroics.description: While active, increases attack power by 10% and increases defense by 20 points.

Heroics.name: Heroics
Heroics.description: While active, increases attack power by 15% and increases defense by 25 points.

Heroics.name: Heroics
Heroics.description: While active, increases attack power by 20% and increases defense by 30 points.

Heroics.name: Heroics
Heroics.description: While active, increases attack power by 30% and increases defense by 40 points.

Horn Maestro.name: Horn Maestro
Horn Maestro.description: Extends melody effects duration and increases health recovery.

Hunger Resistance.name: Hunger Resistance
Hunger Resistance.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.

Hunger Resistance.name: Hunger Resistance
Hunger Resistance.description: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.

Hunger Resistance.name: Hunger Resistance
Hunger Resistance.description: Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

Intimidator.name: Intimidator
Intimidator.description: Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

Iron Skin.name: Iron Skin
Iron Skin.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%.

Iron Skin.name: Iron Skin
Iron Skin.description: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

Latent Power.name: Latent Power
Latent Power.description: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.

Latent Power.name: Latent Power
Latent Power.description: While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.

Latent Power.name: Latent Power
Latent Power.description: While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Latent Power.name: Latent Power
Latent Power.description: While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.

Latent Power.name: Latent Power
Latent Power.description: While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

Master Fisher.name: Master Fisher
Master Fisher.description: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

Master Gatherer.name: Master Gatherer
Master Gatherer.description: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

Master Mounter.name: Master Mounter
Master Mounter.description: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

Mind's Eye/Ballistics.name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
Mind's Eye/Ballistics.description: Prevents deflects. Shortens distance for max bow/gun damage.

Mind's Eye/Ballistics.name: Mind's Eye/Ballistics
Mind's Eye/Ballistics.description: Prevents attacks from being deflected. Also shortens the distance before ammo and arrows reach maximum power.

Muck Resistance.name: Muck Resistance
Muck Resistance.description: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

Mushroomancer.name: Mushroomancer
Mushroomancer.description: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.

Mushroomancer.name: Mushroomancer
Mushroomancer.description: Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.

Mushroomancer.name: Mushroomancer
Mushroomancer.description: Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

Non-elemental Boost.name: Non-elemental Boost
Non-elemental Boost.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

Normal Shots.name: Normal Shots
Normal Shots.description: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

Palico Rally.name: Palico Rally
Palico Rally.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.

Palico Rally.name: Palico Rally
Palico Rally.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.

Palico Rally.name: Palico Rally
Palico Rally.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.

Palico Rally.name: Palico Rally
Palico Rally.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.

Palico Rally.name: Palico Rally
Palico Rally.description: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

Paralysis Functionality.name: Paralysis Functionality
Paralysis Functionality.description: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

Paralysis Resistance.name: Paralysis Resistance
Paralysis Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.

Paralysis Resistance.name: Paralysis Resistance
Paralysis Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

Piercing Shots.name: Piercing Shots
Piercing Shots.description: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

Poison Functionality.name: Poison Functionality
Poison Functionality.description: Allows you to apply posion coatings.

Poison Resistance.name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.

Poison Resistance.name: Poison Resistance
Poison Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.

Pro Transporter.name: Pro Transporter
Pro Transporter.description: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

Protective Polish.name: Protective Polish
Protective Polish.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Protective Polish.name: Protective Polish
Protective Polish.description: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Recovery Speed.name: Recovery Speed
Recovery Speed.description: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Recovery Speed.name: Recovery Speed
Recovery Speed.description: Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Recovery Speed.name: Recovery Speed
Recovery Speed.description: Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

Resuscitate.name: Resuscitate
Resuscitate.description: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

Scholar.name: Scholar
Scholar.description: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

Sleep Functionality.name: Sleep Functionality
Sleep Functionality.description: Allows you to apply sleep coatings

Sleep Resistance.name: Sleep Resistance
Sleep Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.

Sleep Resistance.name: Sleep Resistance
Sleep Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

Slinger Capacity.name: Slinger Capacity
Slinger Capacity.description: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.

Slinger Capacity.name: Slinger Capacity
Slinger Capacity.description: In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

Slinger Capacity.name: Slinger Capacity
Slinger Capacity.description: In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

Special Ammo Boost.name: Special Ammo Boost
Special Ammo Boost.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.

Special Ammo Boost.name: Special Ammo Boost
Special Ammo Boost.description: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

Speed Sharpening.name: Speed Sharpening
Speed Sharpening.description: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.

Speed Sharpening.name: Speed Sharpening
Speed Sharpening.description: Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.

Speed Sharpening.name: Speed Sharpening
Speed Sharpening.description: Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

Spread/Power Shots.name: Spread/Power Shots
Spread/Power Shots.description: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

Stealth.name: Stealth
Stealth.description: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

Stealth.name: Stealth
Stealth.description: Makes it moderatly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

Stealth.name: Stealth
Stealth.description: Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

Stun Resistance.name: Stun Resistance
Stun Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.

Stun Resistance.name: Stun Resistance
Stun Resistance.description: Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

Tremor Resistance.name: Tremor Resistance
Tremor Resistance.description: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.

Tremor Resistance.name: Tremor Resistance
Tremor Resistance.description: Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

Weakness Exploit.name: Weakness Exploit
Weakness Exploit.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.

Weakness Exploit.name: Weakness Exploit
Weakness Exploit.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.

Weakness Exploit.name: Weakness Exploit
Weakness Exploit.description: Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

Wide-Range.name: Wide-Range
Wide-Range.description: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.

Wide-Range.name: Wide-Range
Wide-Range.description: Items affect neabry allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.

Wide-Range.name: Wide-Range
Wide-Range.description: Items affect neabry allies in a wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.

Wide-Range.name: Wide-Range
Wide-Range.description: Items affect neabry allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.

Wide-Range.name: Wide-Range
Wide-Range.description: Items affect neabry allies in a wider radius with full efficacy.

Windproof.name: Windproof
Windproof.description: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.

Windproof.name: Windproof
Windproof.description: Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.

Windproof.name: Windproof
Windproof.description: Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.

Windproof.name: Windproof
Windproof.description: Negates minor and major wind pressure.

Adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
Adrenaline.description: Temporarily reduces stamina depletion when health is at 40% or lower.

Bludgeoner.name: Bludgeoner
Bludgeoner.description: Raises attack as your weapon loses sharpness. Also boosts range weapon melee attacks and odds of stunning.

Capture Master.name: Capture Master
Capture Master.description: High change of increased capture rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Carving Master.name: Carving Master
Carving Master.description: Lets you carve one additional time. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Critical Element.name: Critical Element
Critical Element.description: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

Critical Status.name: Critical Status
Critical Status.description: Increases abnormal status effect damage (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

Good Luck.name: Good Luck
Good Luck.description: Good chance of increased quest rewards. (No effect when joining mid-quest.)

Guts.name: Guts
Guts.description: Above a certain health threshold, you withstand an attack that would normally cart you (once only).

Hasten Recovery.name: Hasten Recovery
Hasten Recovery.description: Regenerates your health as you continually attack a monster. Recovery varies by weapon.

Master's Touch.name: Master's Touch
Master's Touch.description: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

Non-Elemental Boost.name: Non-Elemental Boost
Non-Elemental Boost.description: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

Poison Duration Up.name: Poison Duration Up
Poison Duration Up.description: Extens the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

Punishing Draw.name: Punishing Draw
Punishing Draw.description: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power.

Razor Sharp/Spare Shot.name: Razor Sharp/Spare Shot
Razor Sharp/Spare Shot.description: Halves sharpness loss. For bows and bowguns, shots have a chance not to expend coatings or ammo.

Super Recovery.name: Super Recovery
Super Recovery.description: Allows recovery to exceed the red portion of the health gauge.
